Class AbstractBoltProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.bolt.transport.AbstractBoltProtocol
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoltProtocol
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoltProtocolV3, BoltProtocolV4, BoltProtocolV41, BoltProtocolV42
    public abstract class AbstractBoltProtocol
extends Object
implements BoltProtocol
    The base of building Bolt protocols.
